content.description: A heavily featured mixed line up a beautiful face. Vertical, bolt protected climbing up steep terrain ends with an even more steepening jug haul finish. Dave Bingham hand-drilled this line on lead in 1984.
content.protection: 6 bolts and one or two cams, green Alien or black Totem. Chain anchors on 1/2‚Äù bolts. Stick clip advised for first bolt.
content.location: Left most route, right of the crack/fin features.

content.description: Interesting and exciting climbing up the right side of the crag using cracks and edges. A variety delight of careful, varied climbing with a committing crux. Long and fun!
content.protection: Five bolts and a standard rack.
content.location:

riends Invited

starts up the slab into a varied crack system then moves into an obvious scoop with bolts.
